install.title: Welcome to the Go+ installation with InGop
install.desc: Go+ programming language For engineering, STEM education, and data science

success.go: Environment required for Go+ has been installed successfully !

error.network: Network error, please check your network connection and try again.
error.version: Golang version must be greater than or equal to 1.16, Please uninstall your Golang yourself and click Retry afterwards, InGop will automatically install the appropriate environment for you.
